column1: Number of devices in one communication group for clock synchronization

column3:
10 m x 10 m x 5 m;
50 m x 5 m x 5 m

10 m x 10 m x 5 m;

column1:
NOTE 1:	5G synchronicity budget is the time error between ingress and egress of the 5G system on the path of clock synchronization messages (as described in Clause 5.6.0). For direct device connection, the ingress is one UE and the egress the other directly connected UE.  
NOTE 2:	Service Area for direct device connections between UEs (length x width x height). The group of UEs with direct device connections might move throughout the whole factory site (up to several km²).
